trans-unit.source: Provides data for the events defined on <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para os eventos definidos no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: HtmlElementEventArgs encapsulates the same information found on the `window.event` object when programming against the unmanaged HTML DOM or when writing Active Script for HTML pages.
trans-unit.target: HtmlElementEventArgs encapsula as mesmas informações encontradas no `window.event` quando programação contra o DOM HTML não geridos ou ao escrever o Script de Active Directory para páginas HTML de objeto.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, you can use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ToElement%2A> to find the HTML element that is receiving the event action, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.FromElement%2A> to find the HTML element that the current event is causing us to leave.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos, pode utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ToElement%2A>para encontrar o elemento HTML que está a receber a ação de evento, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.FromElement%2A>para encontrar o elemento HTML que o evento atual está a causar-na manter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.FromElement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ToElement%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, not every event supplies a value for these properties; see the managed documentation for an event, or the corresponding documentation in the Internet Explorer SDK documentation, to discover if the event supplies it.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, nem todos os eventos fornece um valor para estas propriedades; consulte a documentação gerida de um evento ou a documentação correspondente na documentação do SDK do Internet Explorer, para detetar se o evento fornece-lo.

trans-unit.source: Many events in the HTML DOM are sent to their parent elements unless they are cancelled.
trans-unit.target: Muitos eventos no HTML DOM são enviados para os respetivos elementos principais, exceto se estes estão a ser canceladas.

trans-unit.source: This is known as event bubbling.
trans-unit.target: Isto é conhecido como bubbling de eventos.

trans-unit.source: If a `SPAN` inside of a `DIV` receives a click, then a click event is raised for the `SPAN` first, then for the `DIV`, and finally for the HTML page's `BODY` element.
trans-unit.target: Se um `SPAN` dentro de um `DIV` recebe um clique, em seguida, é gerado um evento de clique para o `SPAN` primeiro, em seguida, para o `DIV`e, finalmente, da página HTML `BODY` elemento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A> controls whether an event will behave in this manner or not.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A>Controla se um evento irão comportar-se desta forma ou não.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the ALT key was pressed when this event occurred.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a tecla ALT foi premida quando este evento ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> is the ALT key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>é que foi premida a tecla ALT; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current event bubbles up through the element hierarchy of the HTML Document Object Model.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o evento atual bolhas cópias de segurança através da hierarquia de elemento do modelo de objeto de documento HTML.

trans-unit.source: Not all events in the Document Object Model bubble.
trans-unit.target: Nem todos os eventos no bolha modelo de objeto de documento.

trans-unit.source: All of the events exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument> managed wrapper bubble with the exception of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.Stop>.
trans-unit.target: Todos os eventos expostos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>geridos bolha wrapper com a exceção <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.Stop>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.Stop> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>, the `Error` and `Load` events do not bubble.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>, a `Error` e `Load` eventos não bolha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>

trans-unit.source: Setting `BubbleEvent` to `true` during any of these events will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: Definição `BubbleEvent` para `true` durante um estes eventos não tem qualquer efeito.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event bubbles; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it does not.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o evento bolhas; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se não existir.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the mouse cursor in the document's client area.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a posição do cursor do rato na área de cliente do documento.

trans-unit.source: `ClientMousePosition` gives the mouse position of the cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the document.
trans-unit.target: `ClientMousePosition`Fornece a posição do rato do cursor relativo para o canto superior esquerdo do documento.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.MousePosition%2A> if you need the mouse coordinates relative to the element that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.MousePosition%2A>se terá das coordenadas de rato relativo para o elemento que originou o evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.MousePosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current position of the mouse cursor.
trans-unit.target: A posição atual do cursor do rato.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the CTRL key was pressed when this event occurred.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a tecla CTRL foi premida quando este evento ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the CTRL key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se foi premida a tecla CTRL; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the event that was raised.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do evento que foi gerado.

trans-unit.source: The name of the event.
trans-unit.target: O nome do evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref> the mouse pointer is moving away from.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"> </xref> o ponteiro do rato é mover away do.

trans-unit.source: FromElement will have a valid value during mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseLeave>.
trans-unit.target: FromElement terá um valor válido durante a eventos de rato como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseEnter>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseLeave>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref> the mouse pointer is moving away from.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"> </xref> o ponteiro do rato é mover away do.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ASCII value of the keyboard character typed in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.KeyPress"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.KeyDown"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de ASCII do caráter teclado digitou um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.KeyPress"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.KeyDown"> </xref>, ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.KeyUp"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The ASCII value of the composed keyboard entry.
trans-unit.target: O valor de ASCII da entrada de teclado composto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the mouse button that was clicked during a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseDown"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o botão do rato que foi clicado durante um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseDown"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseUp"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The mouse button that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O botão do rato que foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the mouse cursor relative to a relatively positioned parent element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a posição do cursor do rato em relação a um elemento principal posicionado relativamente.

trans-unit.source: Relative positioning is used in HTML to place an element on a page in relation to its parent.
trans-unit.target: Posicionamento relativo é utilizado no HTML para colocar um elemento numa página em relação ao respetivo elemento principal.

trans-unit.source: If an element is relatively positioned, this property will return the same result as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ClientMousePosition%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se um elemento é posicionado relativamente, esta propriedade irá devolver o mesmo resultado como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ClientMousePosition%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ClientMousePosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the parent of the element that raised the event, if the parent element is relatively positioned.
trans-unit.target: A posição do cursor do rato relativo para o canto superior esquerdo do principal do elemento que desencadeou o evento, se o elemento principal está posicionado relativamente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the mouse cursor relative to the element that raises the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a posição do cursor do rato em relação ao elemento que desencadeia o evento.

trans-unit.source: The mouse position relative to the element that raises the event.
trans-unit.target: A posição do rato em relação ao elemento que desencadeia o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the return value of the handled event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor devolvido do evento processado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o evento foi processado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the SHIFT key was pressed when this event occurred.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a tecla SHIFT foi premida quando este evento ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the SHIFT key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se foi premida a tecla SHIFT; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref> toward which the user is moving the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"> </xref> para que o utilizador está a mover o ponteiro do rato.

trans-unit.source: ToElement will have a valid value during mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseLeave>.
trans-unit.target: ToElement terá um valor válido durante a eventos de rato como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseEnter>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseLeave>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: The element toward which the mouse pointer is moving.
trans-unit.target: O elemento para que o ponteiro do rato é mover.
